sections.summary: to obtain a position with a corporation that can benefit from my highly adapted organizational, problem solving, and communication skills with over fifteen years experience.seasoned customer service specialist with background in providing advice on diverse customer situations. accomplishments #1 in member satisfaction survey's in sears corporate holdings inc out of 420. senior member advocate, over 25+ years in the service industry with half of that in management. exceeded corporate target for customer satisfaction for nine months in a row.
